description: Try our easy to follow Rhubarb & Orange Donut Pudding recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Rhubarb & Orange Donut Pudding Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Pour enough hot water into pan to come halfway up sides of dishes. Bake for 20-25 minutes or until just set in centre. Remove from oven and let stand for 5 minutes. Dust with icing sugar to serve.
